title: Foundations of Mathematical Modeling for High-Speed Rail Spring Steel Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering mathematics, foundational materials science concepts, and ability to interpret functions and graphs
context.additional_context: Environment supporting data analysis and simulation learning via digital devices

learning_goals: The chemical composition of spring steel and heat treatment process variables can be expressed as a mathematical model.
The input-output relationships of a machine learning-based prediction system can be interpreted graphically to derive optimal conditions.
Design parameters satisfying tensile strength (2050±50 MPa) and elongation (10.5%±1.5%) requirements can be defined as equations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
